cause.description:
Tad is asking for everyones help. By a minimum donation of five dollars a person you too can make Tad's dreams come true! or if you dont want to pay by credit card you can send a dollar or two to tad. if you need an adress send me a message.
1. Tad needs a new computer
2. Tad cant afford a new computer
3. Tad wants your help to buy a new computer
cause.mission: help tad be able to afford his dream computer
cause.name: Help Tad
